Question.Subject: whats up with chatroullette today?
Question.Content: it hasnt been connecting with me today, does anyone know whats going on-10 points!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
“Chatroulette allows you to unleash your inner Internet exhibitionist, with no strings attached” Wrong. See, it also allows anybody with video capture software to record whatever you are doing, that you may think is private, and re-post it to the internet permanently for all to enjoy. Sorry, but NOTHING you do on the internet is strictly a “one time thing”.
Opinions: http://pinoytutorial.com/techtorial/chatroullette-free-alternative-adult-chat-visited-review/
